Que.1

public class quest1
{

	public quest1() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
}

class sub extends quest1
{
	
}

class sub2 extends sub
{

	public sub2() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
}



Que.2


class Vehicle
{
	public void start()
	{
		
	}
}

class FourWheeler extends Vehicle
{
	public void start()
	{
		
	}
}


public class quest2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	}

}


Que.3




class vehicle
{
	int carid;

	public vehicle(int carid) {
		super();
		this.carid = carid;
	}
}

class car extends vehicle
{

	public car(int carid) {
		super(carid);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
}

class bike extends vehicle
{

	public bike(int carid) {
		super(carid);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
}








public class quest3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		car c=new car(12);
		bike b=new bike(23);
		
	}

}


Que.4




class Top1
{
	public void disp1()
	{
		
	}
}

class Bottom1 extends Top1
{
    public void disp1()
    {
    	
    }
	
}

class Bottom2 extends Top1
{
	public void disp1()
	{
		
	}
}

class Bottom3 extends Top1
{
	public void disp1()
	{
		
	}
}



public class quest4 {
	
	public static void perform(Top1 ref)
	{
		ref.disp1();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	perform(new Bottom1());
	perform(new Bottom2());
	perform(new Bottom3());
	
	}

}


Que.5


abstract class shape
{
	abstract public void draw();
	
}

 class Triangle extends shape
{

	@Override
	public void draw() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("tri");
	}
	
}


 class Polygon extends shape
 {

	@Override
	public void draw() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("poly");
	}
	 
 }
 
 class Circle extends shape
 {

	@Override
	public void draw() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("cir");
	}
	 
 }
 
 
 
 
 
 


public class quest5 {
	
	public static void showshape(shape ref)
	{
		ref.draw();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		
		shape shapearr[]=new shape[3];
		shapearr[0]=new Triangle();
		shapearr[1]=new Polygon();
		shapearr[2]=new Circle();
		for(int i=0;i<shapearr.length;i++)
		{
			showshape(shapearr[i]);
		}
		
	    
		
		
		
		

	}

}



Que.6


interface A
{
	void disp1();
	
}

interface B extends A
{
	void disp2();
}

class C implements B
{

	@Override
	public void disp1() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("disp1");
	}

	@Override
	public void disp2() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	System.out.println("disp2");
		
	}
	
	public void disp3()
	{
		System.out.println("disp3");
	}
	
}







public class quest6 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

  C obj=new C();
  obj.disp1();
  obj.disp2();
  obj.disp3();
	
}	}


Que.7



class Parent1
{
	void main1()
	{
		System.out.println("parent1");
	}
}

interface Parent2
{
	void main2();
}

class Child extends Parent1 implements Parent2
{
	public void main1()
	{
		System.out.println("main1");
	}

	@Override
	public void main2() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("main2");
	}
	
	void main3()
	{
		System.out.println("main3");
	}
	
}







public class quest7 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		Child obj=new Child();
		obj.main3();
		obj.main2();
		obj.main1();
		
		
	}

}


Que.8



class base1
{

	public base1(int num) {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	System.out.println("in base1");
	}
   
	
}

class sub1 extends base1
{

	public sub1() {
		super(0);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	System.out.println("in sub1 default");
	}
	
	
	public sub1(int num) {
		super(num);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	System.out.println("in sub1 para");
	}

	
	public sub1(int num,int num2) {
		super(num);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	System.out.println("two para");
	}
	

}







public class quest8 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		sub1 s=new sub1();
		sub1 s1=new sub1(10);
		sub1 s2=new sub1(10,20);
		
		
		
		
		
	}

}



Que.9

interface Game
{
	void play();
}

class cricket implements Game
{

	@Override
	public void play() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("cri");
	}
	
}

class football implements Game
{

	@Override
	public void play() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("foot");
	}
	
}

class tennis implements Game
{

	@Override
	public void play() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("tenn");
	}
	
}


public class quest9 {

	public void perform(Game ref)
	{
		ref.play();
	}
	
	
	public void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		perform(new cricket());
		perform(new football());
		perform(new tennis());
		
		
		
		
	}

}
